SEARCH
Package com.sun.jna.platform.win32

Class LMAccess.GROUP_INFO_2

java.lang.Object
com.sun.jna.Structure
com.sun.jna.platform.win32.LMAccess.GROUP_INFO_2
Enclosing interface:
LMAccess
@FieldOrder({"grpi2_name","grpi2_comment","grpi2_group_id","grpi2_attributes"}) public static class LMAccess.GROUP_INFO_2 extends Structure
The GROUP_INFO_2 structure contains information about a global group, including name, identifier, and resource attributes.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.sun.jna.Structure

    Structure.ByReference, Structure.ByValue, Structure.FieldOrder, Structure.StructField

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    int
    grpi2_attributes
    These attributes are hard-coded to SE_GROUP_MANDATORY, SE_GROUP_ENABLED, and SE_GROUP_ENABLED_BY_DEFAULT.
    String
    grpi2_comment
    Pointer to a null-terminated Unicode character string that contains a remark associated with the global group.
    int
    grpi2_group_id
    Specifies a DWORD value that contains the relative identifier (RID) of the global group.
    String
    grpi2_name
    Pointer to a null-terminated Unicode character string that specifies the name of the global group.

  • Field Details

    • grpi2_name

      public String grpi2_name
      Pointer to a null-terminated Unicode character string that specifies the name of the global group.

    • grpi2_comment

      public String grpi2_comment
      Pointer to a null-terminated Unicode character string that contains a remark associated with the global group. This member can be a null string. The comment can contain MAXCOMMENTSZ characters.

    • grpi2_group_id

      public int grpi2_group_id
      Specifies a DWORD value that contains the relative identifier (RID) of the global group.

    • grpi2_attributes

      public int grpi2_attributes
      These attributes are hard-coded to SE_GROUP_MANDATORY, SE_GROUP_ENABLED, and SE_GROUP_ENABLED_BY_DEFAULT.

    • GROUP_INFO_2

      public GROUP_INFO_2()

    • GROUP_INFO_2
